--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/7/03 6:52:13 AM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> > "I made this decision long before I came to these 'Autobot 
lackeys', 
> > as you so affectionately term them.  The Megatron side of Hydras 
is 
> > nothing more than a Predacon wannabe who named himself after 
someone 
> > famous - and Galvatron is Galvatron, ruthless, uncaring, insane 
> > tyrant.  If he even remembers his time as the original Megatron, 
he 
> > pays it no heed."  Empath clenches her fists, and Vok energy 
crackles 
> > around them.  "He is going to pay through the nose for throwing 
away 
> > all those Decepticon lives just to save his own worthless hide."
> 
> Maxima watched her. She had no special ability like what Empath 
had, but she 
> had understanding & reasoning. She was no fool. One who lived this 
long, 
> since the Golden Age would not be a fool. 
> 
> "Tell me more, Empath. I need to know... everything." Her voice was 
dead 
> serious. In her mind, if a leader did not measure up to th original 
> Megatron... they didn't deserve to function! 
> 
> But.. Hydras... something about him that she doubt she could ever 
terminate 
> him. 
> 
> She would listen to Empath... first.

OOC: This is a somewhat biased view of events, of course.

"Everything?"  Empath laughs bitterly.  "Where to begin ... when the 
original Megatron and many of the Seekers were thrown off Astrotrain 
during Starscream's mutiny, they were picked up by Unicron.  The 
planet destroyer gave Megatron a choice: become Unicron's slave or 
die.  The bastard threw away his sanity and the lives of many strong, 
loyal Decepticons to become Galvatron.  Unicron made him some new 
troops from the ashes of the old, and he took over leadership of the 
Decepticons, keeping most of his power even after Unicron was 
destroyed.  He kept us all in line by sheer terror.  After the 
reformat, he was exiled for his crimes.  Now reduced to a blacklisted 
Predacon criminal, Galvatron was forced to use mind-altering control 
chips to gain followers.  I was one of these."

Empath pauses for a moment, then continues.  "Meanwhile, another 
Predacon took the name of Megatron and sought to steal enough energon 
to conquer Cybertron for himself.  A group of Maximals captured him 
and his crew and brought them back.  Some careless guards allowed him 
to escape with a new crew and he came here.  Galvatron also found his 
way here, with me still enslaved to his blasted Galvapred chip.  
While here, I found an artifact which set me free.  Galvatron ended 
up fusing with Megatron, and the rest you know."
